description: Variation of Condition 1, 14 and 15 and removal of condition 13 of planning permission (21/02681/FULL) dated 10 September 2021 which in turn permitted the removal of condition 12 and to vary conditions 5, 19 and 20 of planning permission dated 25 October 2018 (RN: 17/11171/FULL) for, 'Demolition and redevelopment of existing building to provide a new building comprising two sub-basement levels, ground and eight upper floors. Use of part basement and ground floor for retail (Class A1) purposes and use of part of rear ground floor as for either dual/alternative retail (Class A1) or restaurant (Class A3) purposes, use of the remainder of the building for office (Class B1) purposes. Installation of plant at sub-basement level -2, seventh, eighth and roof level. Creation of a terrace at eighth floor level'; NAMELY; for relocation of the office entrance, incorporation of a blue roof, reconfiguration of the commercial space at ground floor and alterations encompassing additional carbon savings to the fa√ßade including the degree of openability. increasing the extent of the approved basement, to allow primary cooking to be carried out within the flexible retail/ restaurant unit and for the flexible retail/ restaurant unit to be allowed to accommodate 40 customers and operate from 07:00 to 23:30 daily. (Application under Section 73 of the Act).
